name: retro-terminal
description: Throwback retro CRT style layout with a terminal.
author: Brandon Helms

scripts.copy-src: mkdir -p dist && cp -R src/* dist/ && rm -rf dist/sass
scripts.prebuild:dev: npm run clean && npm run copy-src
scripts.build:dev: npm run prebuild:dev && npm run sass
scripts.start:dev: nodemon --watch src --ext '' --exec 'npm run build:dev' & http-server dist -p 8888 -c no-store
scripts.prebuild:prod: npm run clean && npm run copy-src
scripts.build:prod: npm run prebuild:prod && npm run sass && npm run minify:html && rm -rf dist/sass
scripts.predeploy: npm run build:prod && mkdir -p release && cp -R dist/* release/
